menu-layout.tooltip: Checking this box allows you to use MATE-Menu layout, else Stark-Menu layout is used

overlay-key.description: Keyboard shortcut to open and close the menu

menu-icon-custom.tooltip: Unchecking this allows the theme to set the icon

menu-icon.tooltip: Select an icon to show in the panel.

menu-label.tooltip: Enter custom text to show in the panel.

show-places.tooltip: Choose whether or not to show bookmarks and places in the menu.

enable-autoscroll.tooltip: Choose whether or not to enable smooth autoscrolling in the application list.

search-filesystem.description: Enable filesystem path entry in search box
search-filesystem.tooltip: Allows path entry in the menu search box.

activate-on-hover.description: Open the menu when I move my mouse over it
activate-on-hover.tooltip: Enable opening the menu when the mouse enters the applet

menu-editor-button.tooltip: Press this button to customize your menu entries.

show-category-icons.tooltip: Choose whether or not to show icons on categories.

show-application-icons.tooltip: Choose whether or not to show icons on applications.

favorite-icon-size.description: Size of the Favorite Button Icons:
favorite-icon-size.tooltip: Change the size of the Favorite Buttons Icons

head-button-label.description: Labels on buttons in the menu

show-user-icon-label.tooltip: Choose whether or not to show the username.

show-quicklinks-shutdown-menu.tooltip: Choose whether or not to show the Quit Menu.

quicklinks-shutdown-menu-options.tooltip: Choose the layout of the Quit Menu.

show-quicklinks.tooltip: Choose whether or not to show the Quicklinks Sidebar.

quicklink-options.tooltip: Choose whether to show icons and/or labels in the Quicklinks Sidebar.

quicklink-0-checkbox.tooltip: Choose whether or not to show this Quicklink in the Quicklinks sidebar.

quicklink-0.tooltip: Entry for your Quicklink. Title,icon,command. If the icon does not contain an extension then it will look for the closest icon by name in the current theme. Otherwise it will find the icon by path.

quicklink-1-checkbox.tooltip: Choose whether or not to show this Quicklink in the Quicklinks sidebar.

quicklink-1.tooltip: Entry for your Quicklink. Title,icon,command. If the icon does not contain an extension then it will look for the closest icon by name in the current theme. Otherwise it will find the icon by path.
